svg.onload: top.window.console.log('test 30 passed: dynamic object svg, svg onload markup, handler called'); if (this.nodeName == 'svg') { top.window.console.log('test 31 passed: dynamic object svg, svg onload markup, this is correct in handler'); } try { mywindowFunc32(); } catch(e) { top.window.console.log('test 32 failure:' + (e.message || e)); }

circle.onclick: top.window.console.log('test 33 passed: dynamic object svg, circle onclick markup, handler called'); if (this.nodeName == 'circle') { top.window.console.log('test 34 passed: dynamic object svg, circle onclick markup, this is correct in handler'); } try { mywindowFunc35(); } catch(e) { top.window.console.log('test 35 failure:' + (e.message || e)); }
